ygData.subject: Re: research item on lvl 16+
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thats Pretty much Holding true at level 25 ... But if Find That Reisist go higher I could Hit creatures level 29 with my 24 spells but 30+ were maybes if
ygData.messageBody:
Vumar wrote:

> From: "Vumar" <roleplay@...>
>
> That is incorrect.
> 4+ Levels lower green
> 1-3 level lower blue
> 1-2 Levels Higher is yellow.
> 3+ is red.
>
> 5+ levels higher resists all spells.
>
> This is true up till level 16. After that it may change I don't know since I
> am not that high up.
>
> Vumar
>

Thats Pretty much Holding true at level 25 ... But if Find That Reisist go higher I could Hit creatures level 29 with my 24 spells but 30+ were maybes if Malise never took



--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage
Erollisi Marr

-----------------------------------------------------------

"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."

"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"

"Two are 10 times more powerful than One"
